ComicInfo.Summary: The world of Spawn is still recoiling from the stunning revelations of issue 185. As word of those game changing events echo from the rafters of Heaven to the depths of Hell, players begin to study the board, plot their strategies and make their move.
ComicInfo.Tags: Brock Fennel,Sara Johnston,Spawn (Downing),Jessica Tokwell,Manhattan,New York State,Marc Rosen,Spawn: Endgame,Long Island,Extractor,New York City
ComicInfo.Title: Endgame Part Three
